archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Archi
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Archi is a software tool for ArchiMate modelling, which is a language for modelling enterprise architecture. Archi is an open-source tool that is available for Windows, macOS, and Linux. It provides a graphical interface for creating and editing ArchiMate models, and it also supports the export of models to various formats, such as PDF and XML. Archi is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use, making it a popular choice for enterprise architects who want to create and maintain ArchiMate models.
Note: to have rights to use this we must have Open Group Membership.
